definitions.definition: Wandering from place to place, particularly when without any settled employment or habitation .
Of or pertaining to a vagabond or vagrant , or a person fond of wandering .
Moving without a certain direction ; roving , wandering ; also, erratic , unsettled .

main_definition: Wandering from place to place, particularly when without any settled employment or habitation .
secondary_definitions: Of or pertaining to a vagabond or vagrant , or a person fond of wandering .
( figurative ) Moving without a certain direction ; roving , wandering ; also, erratic , unsettled .
